data.question: What is the empirical formula of SLUG-32?
What method was used to monitor the transformation between SLUG-6 and SLUG-32?
Can SLUG-32 be synthesized both hydrothermally and by crystal-to-crystal anion exchange?
What is the crystal system of SLUG-33?
What is the role of perchlorate in the hydrothermal synthesis of SLUG-32?
Is the [Pb2F2]2+ layer retained in both SLUG-32 and SLUG-33 after anion exchange?
What indicates the completion of the anion exchange process from SLUG-6 to SLUG-32?
data.answer: No further change in crystal morphology occurs after 4 hours.

data.question: What was used to confirm the anion exchange process?
Did the anion exchange process for SLUG-33 result in a high purity product?
What was the yield of SLUG-32 using the anion exchange method?
What is the significance of the elongation of the [Pb2F2]2+ layers along the c axis in SLUG-32?
data.answer: It is due to a stronger carboxylate-lead interaction.

data.question: Is the crystallographic space group I4/m shared by both SLUG-32 and SLUG-33?
What was the primary method used for structural characterization of the post-anion exchange products?
What does the presence of the (001) peak at 7.4° (2θ) in the PXRD pattern indicate?
data.answer: The presence of the new SLUG-33 phase

data.question: Was the anion exchange process solvent-mediated?
What was the observed percentage of carbon in SLUG-33?
Does the anion exchange process allow for the tuning of interlayer-spacing?
What was the crystal system identified for SLUG-32?
What does the increase in cell dimension along the c-axis from SLUG-32 to SLUG-33 suggest?
data.answer: It agrees well with the carboxylate chain length difference.

data.question: Is the anion exchange process for SLUG-6 to SLUG-32 and SLUG-33 efficient and complete?
